Package com.flipfit.dao

Class CustomerDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.dao.CustomerDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CustomerDAOInterface
public class CustomerDAOImpl extends Object implements CustomerDAOInterface
Author:
Dhruv Data Access Object (DAO) implementation for customer-related operations. This class handles all interactions with the database for the customer role, including searching for gyms, booking slots, and managing bookings.

    • isSlotBooked

      public boolean isSlotBooked(String slotId, Date date)
      Checks if a specific time slot is fully booked for a given date.
      Specified by:
      isSlotBooked in interface CustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique ID of the time slot.
      date - The date for which to check the booking status.
      Returns:
      true if the slot is booked, false otherwise.

    • bookSlot

      public int bookSlot(String gymId, String slotId, String customerEmail, Date date)
      Books a time slot for a customer. It checks for availability and either confirms the booking or adds it to a waiting list.
      Specified by:
      bookSlot in interface CustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique ID of the gym.
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to be booked.
      customerEmail - The email of the customer.
      date - The date of the booking.
      Returns:
      An integer flag indicating the booking status (0: re-booked, 1: waitlisted, 2: confirmed, 3: not found).

    • getBookings

      public List<Booking> getBookings(String email)
      Retrieves all bookings made by a specific customer.
      Specified by:
      getBookings in interface CustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the customer.
      Returns:
      A List of Booking objects associated with the customer.

    • cancelBooking

      public boolean cancelBooking(String bookingId, String email)
      Cancels an existing booking for a customer.
      Specified by:
      cancelBooking in interface CustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The unique ID of the booking to be cancelled.
      email - The email of the customer.
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successfully cancelled, false otherwise.
